LineOfSight.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /* (c) 2017. Andreychuk A.
2  * This class implements line-of-sight function for a variable size of agent.
3  * It also has a method for checking cell's traversability.
4  * For its work is needed the size of agent and a map container that has 'cellIsObstacle' and 'cellOnGrid' methods.
5  * If it is not possible to give the permission to access the grid, the one can use 'getCellsCrossedByLine' method.
6  * It doesn't use grid and returns a set of all cells(as pairs of coordinates) that are crossed by an agent moving along a line.
7  */
8 
9 #ifndef LINEOFSIGHT_H
10 #define LINEOFSIGHT_H
11 
12 
13 #define CN_OBSTACLE 1
14 
15 #include <vector>
16 #include <math.h>
17 #include <algorithm>
18 #include <iostream>
19 
20 #include "Const.h"
21 
22 class LineOfSight
23 {
24 public:
25  LineOfSight(double agentSize = 0.5)
26  {
27  this->agentSize = agentSize;
28  int add_x, add_y, num = agentSize + 0.5 - CN_EPS;
29  for(int x = -num; x <= +num; x++)
30  for(int y = -num; y <= +num; y++)
31  {
32  add_x = x != 0 ? 1 : 0;
33  add_y = y != 0 ? 1 : 0;
34  if((pow(2*abs(x) - add_x, 2) + pow(2*abs(y) - add_y, 2)) < pow(2*agentSize, 2))
35  cells.push_back({x, y});
36  }
37  if(cells.empty())
38  cells.push_back({0,0});
39  }
40 
41  void setSize(double agentSize)
42  {
43  this->agentSize = agentSize;
44  int add_x, add_y, num = agentSize + 0.5 - CN_EPS;
45  cells.clear();
46  for(int x = -num; x <= +num; x++)
47  for(int y = -num; y <= +num; y++)
48  {
49  add_x = x != 0 ? 1 : 0;
50  add_y = y != 0 ? 1 : 0;
51  if((pow(2*abs(x) - add_x, 2) + pow(2*abs(y) - add_y, 2)) < pow(2*agentSize, 2))
52  cells.push_back({x, y});
53  }
54  if(cells.empty())
55  cells.push_back({0,0});
56  }
57 
58  template <class T>
59  std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> getCellsCrossedByLine(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, const T &map)
60  {
61  std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> lineCells(0);
62  if(x1 == x2 && y1 == y2)
63  {
64  for(auto cell:cells)
65  lineCells.push_back({x1+cell.first, y1+cell.second});
66  return lineCells;
67  }
68  int delta_x = std::abs(x1 - x2);
69  int delta_y = std::abs(y1 - y2);
70  if((delta_x >= delta_y && x1 > x2) || (delta_y > delta_x && y1 > y2))
71  {
72  std::swap(x1, x2);
73  std::swap(y1, y2);
74  }
75  int step_x = (x1 < x2 ? 1 : -1);
76  int step_y = (y1 < y2 ? 1 : -1);
77  int error = 0, x = x1, y = y1;
78  int k, num;
79  std::pair<int, int> add;
80  int gap = agentSize*sqrt(pow(delta_x, 2) + pow(delta_y, 2)) + double(delta_x + delta_y)/2 - CN_EPS;
81 
82  if(delta_x >= delta_y)
83  {
84  int extraCheck = agentSize*delta_y/sqrt(pow(delta_x, 2) + pow(delta_y, 2)) + 0.5 - CN_EPS;
85  for(int n = 1; n <= extraCheck; n++)
86  {
87  error += delta_y;
88  num = (gap - error)/delta_x;
89  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
90  lineCells.push_back({x1 - n*step_x, y1 + k*step_y});
91  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
92  lineCells.push_back({x2 + n*step_x, y2 - k*step_y});
93  }
94  error = 0;
95  for(x = x1; x != x2 + step_x; x+=step_x)
96  {
97  lineCells.push_back({x, y});
98  if(x < x2 - extraCheck)
99  {
100  num = (gap + error)/delta_x;
101  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
102  lineCells.push_back({x, y + k*step_y});
103  }
104  if(x > x1 + extraCheck)
105  {
106  num = (gap - error)/delta_x;
107  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
108  lineCells.push_back({x, y - k*step_y});
109  }
110  error += delta_y;
111  if((error<<1) > delta_x)
112  {
113  y += step_y;
114  error -= delta_x;
115  }
116  }
117  }
118  else
119  {
120  int extraCheck = agentSize*delta_x/sqrt(pow(delta_x, 2) + pow(delta_y, 2)) + 0.5 - CN_EPS;
121  for(int n = 1; n <= extraCheck; n++)
122  {
123  error += delta_x;
124  num = (gap - error)/delta_y;
125  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
126  lineCells.push_back({x1 + k*step_x, y1 - n*step_y});
127  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
128  lineCells.push_back({x2 - k*step_x, y2 + n*step_y});
129  }
130  error = 0;
131  for(y = y1; y != y2 + step_y; y += step_y)
132  {
133  lineCells.push_back({x, y});
134  if(y < y2 - extraCheck)
135  {
136  num = (gap + error)/delta_y;
137  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
138  lineCells.push_back({x + k*step_x, y});
139  }
140  if(y > y1 + extraCheck)
141  {
142  num = (gap - error)/delta_y;
143  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
144  lineCells.push_back({x - k*step_x, y});
145  }
146  error += delta_x;
147  if((error<<1) > delta_y)
148  {
149  x += step_x;
150  error -= delta_y;
151  }
152  }
153  }
154  for(k = 0; k < cells.size(); k++)
155  {
156  add = {x1 + cells[k].first, y1 + cells[k].second};
157  if(std::find(lineCells.begin(), lineCells.end(), add) == lineCells.end())
158  lineCells.push_back(add);
159  add = {x2 + cells[k].first, y2 + cells[k].second};
160  if(std::find(lineCells.begin(), lineCells.end(), add) == lineCells.end())
161  lineCells.push_back(add);
162  }
163 
164  for(auto it = lineCells.begin(); it != lineCells.end(); it++)
165  if(!map.CellOnGrid(it->first, it->second))
166  {
167  lineCells.erase(it);
168  it = lineCells.begin();
169  }
170  return lineCells;
171  }
172  //returns all cells that are affected by agent during moving along a line
173 
174  template <class T>
175  bool checkTraversability(int x, int y, const T &map)
176  {
177  for(int k = 0; k < cells.size(); k++)
178  if(!map.CellOnGrid(x + cells[k].first, y + cells[k].second) || map.CellIsObstacle(x + cells[k].first, y + cells[k].second))
179  return false;
180  return true;
181  }
182  //checks traversability of all cells affected by agent's body
183 
184  template <class T>
185  bool checkLine(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, const T &map)
186  {
187  //std::cout<<x1<<" "<<y1<<" "<<x2<<" "<<y2<<" "<<"\n";
188  if(!checkTraversability(x1, y1, map) || !checkTraversability(x2, y2, map)) //additional che—Åk of start and goal traversability,
189  return false; //it can be removed if they are already checked
190 
191  int delta_x = std::abs(x1 - x2);
192  int delta_y = std::abs(y1 - y2);
193  if((delta_x > delta_y && x1 > x2) || (delta_y >= delta_x && y1 > y2))
194  {
195  std::swap(x1, x2);
196  std::swap(y1, y2);
197  }
198  int step_x = (x1 < x2 ? 1 : -1);
199  int step_y = (y1 < y2 ? 1 : -1);
200  int error = 0, x = x1, y = y1;
201  int gap = agentSize*sqrt(pow(delta_x, 2) + pow(delta_y, 2)) + double(delta_x + delta_y)/2 - CN_EPS;
202  int k, num;
203 
204  if(delta_x > delta_y)
205  {
206  int extraCheck = agentSize*delta_y/sqrt(pow(delta_x, 2) + pow(delta_y, 2)) + 0.5 - CN_EPS;
207  for(int n = 1; n <= extraCheck; n++)
208  {
209  error += delta_y;
210  num = (gap - error)/delta_x;
211  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
212  if(map.CellOnGrid(x1 - n*step_x, y1 + k*step_y))
213  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x1 - n*step_x, y1 + k*step_y))
214  return false;
215  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
216  if(map.CellOnGrid(x2 + n*step_x, y2 - k*step_y))
217  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x2 + n*step_x, y2 - k*step_y))
218  return false;
219  }
220  error = 0;
221  for(x = x1; x != x2 + step_x; x+=step_x)
222  {
223  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x, y))
224  return false;
225  if(x < x2 - extraCheck)
226  {
227  num = (gap + error)/delta_x;
228  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
229  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x, y + k*step_y))
230  return false;
231  }
232  if(x > x1 + extraCheck)
233  {
234  num = (gap - error)/delta_x;
235  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
236  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x, y - k*step_y))
237  return false;
238  }
239  error += delta_y;
240  if((error<<1) > delta_x)
241  {
242  y += step_y;
243  error -= delta_x;
244  }
245  }
246  }
247  else
248  {
249  int extraCheck = agentSize*delta_x/sqrt(pow(delta_x, 2) + pow(delta_y, 2)) + 0.5 - CN_EPS;
250  for(int n = 1; n <= extraCheck; n++)
251  {
252  error += delta_x;
253  num = (gap - error)/delta_y;
254  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
255  if(map.CellOnGrid(x1 + k*step_x, y1 - n*step_y))
256  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x1 + k*step_x, y1 - n*step_y))
257  return false;
258  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
259  if(map.CellOnGrid(x2 - k*step_x, y2 + n*step_y))
260  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x2 - k*step_x, y2 + n*step_y))
261  return false;
262  }
263  error = 0;
264  for(y = y1; y != y2 + step_y; y += step_y)
265  {
266  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x, y))
267  return false;
268  if(y < y2 - extraCheck)
269  {
270  num = (gap + error)/delta_y;
271  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
272  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x + k*step_x, y))
273  return false;
274  }
275  if(y > y1 + extraCheck)
276  {
277  num = (gap - error)/delta_y;
278  for(k = 1; k <= num; k++)
279  if(map.CellIsObstacle(x - k*step_x, y))
280  return false;
281  }
282  error += delta_x;
283  if((error<<1) > delta_y)
284  {
285  x += step_x;
286  error -= delta_y;
287  }
288  }
289  }
290  return true;
291  }
292  //checks line-of-sight between a line
293  std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> getCells(int i, int j)
294  {
295  std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> cells;
296  for(int k=0; k<this->cells.size(); k++)
297  cells.push_back({i+this->cells[k].first,j+this->cells[k].second});
298  return cells;
299  }
300 private:
301  double agentSize;
302  std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> cells; //cells that are affected by agent's body
303 };
